message.label: Additional Notes

success.title: Assessment Request Sent!
success.description: Thank you for your interest! Our AI experts will review your snapshot and contact you within 24 hours with a detailed analysis and personalized recommendations.

description: A rapid assessment tool to evaluate AI maturity across key organizational dimensions. This quick check provides immediate insights into your organization's AI readiness and highlights areas of uncertainty that may require deeper assessment.
instructions: For each question, select the answer that best describes your organization's current state. Each answer provides insights into your maturity level and potential areas for improvement.

Partially.interpretation: Some progress but room for improvement

No.interpretation: Significant work needed in this area

I Don't Know.interpretation: Red flag - requires deeper assessment or expert help

questions.question: Is there a clear, enforced process to govern AI use, ensure accountability, and review unintended consequences?

Yes.description: Clear governance processes are in place and actively enforced

Partially.description: Some governance exists but may not be comprehensive or consistently enforced

No.description: No clear governance processes for AI use and accountability

I Don't Know.description: Uncertainty about governance processes - requires investigation

questions.question: Does your organization have an approved AI strategy, budget, and visible leadership sponsorship driving adoption?

Yes.description: Clear AI strategy, dedicated budget, and visible leadership support

Partially.description: Some strategic elements exist but may lack full commitment or resources

No.description: No clear AI strategy, budget, or leadership commitment

I Don't Know.description: Uncertainty about strategic direction and leadership commitment

questions.question: Is your workforce equipped and motivated to safely adopt AI, with training, defined roles, and a supportive culture?

Yes.description: Workforce is well-trained, roles are defined, and culture supports AI adoption

Partially.description: Some training and role definition exists but may not be comprehensive

No.description: Workforce lacks training, clear roles, or supportive culture for AI

I Don't Know.description: Uncertainty about workforce readiness and cultural support

questions.question: Are your AI platforms, security, testing processes, and data governance robust, integrated, and continually improved?

Yes.description: Robust technology infrastructure, security, testing, and data governance in place

Partially.description: Some technology and data foundations exist but may need strengthening

No.description: Lack of robust technology infrastructure, security, or data governance

I Don't Know.description: Uncertainty about technology and data foundation capabilities

questions.question: Is there a process to measure, monitor, and continuously improve AI's performance, ROI, and trustworthiness?

Yes.description: Comprehensive processes for measuring AI performance, ROI, and trust

Partially.description: Some measurement and oversight processes exist but may be limited

No.description: No processes for measuring AI performance, ROI, or trustworthiness

I Don't Know.description: Uncertainty about measurement and oversight capabilities

16-20.description: Strong AI foundation across all key areas. Focus on optimization and advanced capabilities.
recommendations: Share best practices with industry peers

11-15.description: Good progress in most areas with some opportunities for improvement.

6-10.description: Moderate AI readiness with significant areas needing attention.
recommendations: Invest in workforce training and culture change

0-5.description: Limited AI readiness requiring foundational work across multiple areas.
recommendations: Start with basic AI governance and strategy
Build foundational technology and data capabilities

uncertainty_guidance.description: Any 'I Don't Know' responses indicate high uncertainty and should be addressed as priority areas.
recommendations: Conduct deeper assessment in uncertain areas
Engage subject matter experts for evaluation
Develop clear understanding before proceeding with AI initiatives

usage_notes.scoring: Each 'Yes' ‚âà High Maturity, 'Partially' ‚âà Mid Maturity, 'No' ‚âà Low Maturity
usage_notes.uncertainty: 'I Don't Know' highlights uncertainty ‚Äî a red flag for deeper assessment or expert help
usage_notes.next_steps: Use results to identify priority areas for improvement and determine if detailed assessment is needed
